availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nimrod R. Colvin (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmworker, pvt 4th Ky Cav CSA)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmworker and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Nimrod Colvin and Malinda Colvin. Married to Sarah Arabelle Wright Colvin. Farmworker in Pendleton County in 1860. Served in the 4th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 444.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 0027.
